attributes.action: Stop Dartford Borough Council building anymore homes
attributes.additional_details: To improve people’s lives, to stop premature deaths
attributes.background: Because of the amount of housing being built in the Dartford Borough the local hospital Darenth Valley can’t cope, the build up of traffic around Dartford bridge brings the whole area to a standstill still every day, people’s lives are being destroyed, the hospital is being bought to it knees

rejection.details:
We can’t accept petitions that request action at a local level. This is an issue that 
Dartford Borough Council is responsible for, not Parliament or the Government.

You could ask your MP to take action on your concerns about this issue, including by asking them to present a public petition about this.

You can find contact details for your local MP here: https://members.parliament.uk/FindYourMP
